Commands.Toy Soldier: 6-hit group melee BRV attackBRV attacks distributed based on number of enemiesSelf: 5 turns PHY ATK Up IBecomes Toy Soldier+ when party has 3 or more buffs, but less than 6; becomes Toy Soldier++ with 6 or more
Commands.Mog Dance: Party: 6 turns Cheerful GiftBecomes Mog Dance+ when party has 3 or more buffs, but less than 6; becomes Mog Dance++ with 6 or more

Artifacts.Buffed Guard: Raises Defense Power by 10% while buffed.
Artifacts.Mog Fever Boost: Increases the effects of Mog Fever by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Toy Soldier: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Toy Soldier by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Mog Dance: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Mog Dance.

Passives.Toy Soldier Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Toy Soldier, Toy Soldier+ and Toy Soldier++.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage upon attacking an enemy that is not targeting the user.
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after inflicting a critical hit.
Passives.Mog Dance Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Mog Dance, Mog Dance+ or Mog Dance++.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Toy Soldier Charge: Increases the max uses of Toy Soldier by 1.
Passives.Mog Dance Charge: Increases the max uses of Mog Dance by 1.
Passives.Mog Fever: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while 2 buffs or more are active (on self).
Passives.Speed Cheerful Gift: Moderately raises SPD while Cheerful Gift active
Passives.Toy Soldier Extension: Toy Soldier use +1When using Toy Soldier, Toy Soldier+, Toy Soldier++: Slight cumulative damage boost Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150% Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 100% of MAX at time of use; HP damage shared Slight PHY ATK Up boost
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Mog Dance Extension: Mog Dance use +1When using Mog Dance, Mog Dance+, Mog Dance++: BRV granted to party based on own MAX BRV Higher turn rateBRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (grants BRV to party based on own MAX BRV after BRV attack) while Cheerful Gift active

Weapons.Silver Megaphone CP: 35: Turns Mog Dance permanently to Mog Dance+.Improves the effects of Max BRV Up, Attack Up, Cheerful Gift and extends their duration.Lowers action delay.
Weapons.Green Megaphone CP: 15: Turns Toy Soldier permanently to Toy Soldier+.Increases the potency of Toy Soldier+ and Toy Soldier++.Increses the potency of Physical Attack Up and extends its duration.
